item.title: An Intuitive Explanation of Inferential Distance
item.description: Let us represent our beliefs as nodes in a network. Most nodes in your network of beliefs have dependencies, they are connected to other beliefs the truth value of which they are contingent on. Picture a subset of your network of beliefs, let us take a simplified section that looks like a tree, stripping away the complex interconnections to aid in visualization. Beliefs B and C are predicated on belief A, beliefs D and E on belief B, and beliefs F and G on belief C.
